title: Calories in Malibu Rum
meta_description: Learn the calories in Malibu Rum per 1 fl oz serving, including carbs, sugars, alcohol content, and tips for cocktails without extra calories.
assumptions: Standard Malibu Rum (21% ABV, coconut-flavored liqueur), served neat; 1 fl oz ≈ 30 ml.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact ABV, added sugars, and serving size. Alcoholic beverages should be consumed responsibly; check labels.

quick_answer.text: One fluid ounce of Malibu Rum has about 69 calories, primarily from alcohol and coconut flavoring sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison, though alcohol is not always listed on labels.

tweaks.label: Mixed with 4 oz diet soda (zero-calorie mixer)
Add 1 oz heavy cream for a creamy twist
Use regular rum (40% ABV, unsweetened) instead

faqs.q: How many calories in a shot of Malibu Rum?
faqs.a: A standard 1.5 fl oz shot has about 104 calories.

faqs.q: Does Malibu Rum have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 5.7 g carbs and 5.7 g sugars per 1 fl oz from the coconut flavoring.
Moderately; low carbs per serving but the sugars add up in cocktails—opt for zero-sugar mixers.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 ml of Malibu Rum?
What affects the calories in Malibu Rum?
faqs.a: ABV, added sugars, and mixers; plain Malibu is lower than in sugary cocktails like piña coladas.
